title: Furnished South End Studio - No Broker Fee
posting_body: Oversized studio perfectly located in the heart of the South End.

Perched on the third floor, this unit features a separate sleeping space, full living and dining areas, open and fully applianced kitchen with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, gas cooking, and plenty of cabinet space.
Additional features include five large windows that flood the unit with beautiful natural light, hardwood floors throughout, and high ceilings.
Central heat and air conditioning, recessed lighting, and washer/dryer in unit.

Located in the the SOWA arts district, around the corner from the neighborhood's best restaurants including Boston Chops, Burro Bar and The Gallows, as well as Foodies Market, Brix Wine Shop, Boston Sports Club and Peter's Park.
Convenient to I-93 and the Mass Pike, as well as the Silverline.
